coding enviroment¶

TL;DR; you download the D6Arduino.rar, use it as a portable arduino or Windows. In the directory, where arduino.exe is located, you will find .rar file that can be used to flash the firmware with OTA procedure. The code can be flashed directly through Arduino using ST-link as showed in the Hardware overview chapter

the repository, where all arduino files needed for compiling the code are available here.

and the video explaining how to use it is here2.

the repository with ATC’s P8 arduino code is here3.

usefull DaFlasher files here4.

dafit update protocol.

flashing the watch without opening
